work.name: Folkpool
work.title: Sales
work.description: Experience in specialized sales, particularly in pools and hot tubs, gained within a dynamic retail setting. My role involved overseeing entire pool projects, from initial planning to successful completion, showcasing my adept project management skills. Additionally, I managed daily store operations, including operating cash registers and maintaining inventory levels to ensure seamless store management. Alongside these responsibilities, I upheld a high standard of store cleanliness while consistently delivering exceptional customer service.
